website_summaries.verdict: One of the more advanced models from well-known Zebco name. Will work in many fishing environments.
pros: Design allows for either right- or left-handed setup and operation
Good reel for beginners to learn how to cast
You'll have success with mid- to long-distance casts
cons: Drag adjustment knob may get in the way while fishing

customer_reviews.title: Pro vs. regular zo3
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, then read a review comparing this with the regular zo3 so I ordered also both. The pro model is lighter, and cranks in faster, but in my opinion, isn't as well built as the silver zo3. They use some gears on the pro model that is in the bullet. They are lightweight pot metal. The silver zo3 gear ratio 2.9:1 The pro model is 3.4:1 So basically in a tug of war the regular zo3 wins. But with the pro model you get extra marketing, a fancier box, and an extra crank, and cheaper gears.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie goodm a n

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Reel!
customer_reviews.text: It came with the single knob crank handle installed as shown in the picture. The single knob handle has no offset and when it was positioned toward the butt of the rod it would rub against my hand. However, included in the box was a dual knob crank handle with just the right amount of offset to solve the issue. This is the smoothest spincast reel I've ever owned and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: High quality, precision reel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reel for my wife. She had tried and tried to learn to cast a bait caster, but always ended up frustrated. After a little research I decided to purchase the omega zo3pro. It cast much better than i ever expected. There is no comparison between the Zebco 33 or the 202. The reel comes with two spools one with 10lb test and the other with 6lb test, they are easily interchanged. The reel also comes with two reel handles, the single one as in the picture has a round finger knob, and a double handle with flat comfortable finger knobs. I was blown away by quality of this reel. I would recommend it to any and everyone
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: It performed remarkable well with the light lures - good distance, no jerk-backs
customer_reviews.text: I just returned from Lake Otsego on a family vacation. I used the Omega ZO3PRO for light spinners with single hook flies as well as other small lures. It performed remarkable well with the light lures - good distance, no jerk-backs, no internal tangling and a smooth delivery and retrieve. I'll be buying this for other family members. It's a long term investment is equipment and enjoyment and worth the little extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M. Hoxie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, AT FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: This reel felt good in the hand and was smooth the first two fishing trips. Still casts well, but Now starting to grind when retrieving and not smooth rolling up at all. Unfortunately I’m 3 days past my return window. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Not for the avid fisherman
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for a reel that I can use to cast an 1/8 bait with accuracy and line control under boat docks and the like. Well this is not it. Two issues force me to resign this reel to the don't like it pile. First the max drag preset is to light for close combat with fish you hook under docks and other gnarly sites. Second the drag adjustment sets atop the reel and for a reel palming fisherman it will unknowingly readjusted, for me that was always a reduction in what little drag there was.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil D. Gosch

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing real it is so worth the money I will ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing real it is so worth the money I will never go back to the old baitcaster ever again this real reels and quick and smooth and picks up the line when you start to reel very well it is very durable with all metal parts as I have used this real and saltwater as with the Intensive rinsing afterwards but is not a big deal but with all things you must take care of it and it will work for you!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Last Zebco reel I'll buy
customer_reviews.text: I was initially happy with this reel. The motion was nice and cast well. However after about 20 casts it wasn't reeling in any more. I took it apart and found that the "cap" that holds the line spool on pulled right off the threaded post. Its like the threading isn't a match between the two pieces and was just barely holding initially. I certainly didn't abuse the reel, and would not expect that as a point of failure in any case. I can't see buying another zebco product if this is reflective of their "pro" series.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One best Spincast Reels on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Zebco is the king of spincast reels. My kids used Zebco 33 growing up. They are still going strong. The Omega Pro Z03PRO is solid with metal housing. Very smooth reeling. Comes with extra double handles and spool. Easy to by just pressing and releasing the button to cast. Only improvement is strong drag to fight the Hogs. Recommended buy if you want a easy to use low maintenance fishing reel. Good for beginners too.
customer_reviews.author: Bass Man

customer_reviews.title: they need a waranty
customer_reviews.text: GREAT REEL after 3 months the plastic trigger is broke after careful use.company is going to replace the broken part but instead sent a brand new reel! Zebco is a great comp to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonprime

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for me
customer_reviews.text: This is an over built version of the spin cast reel. That's not why I bought it. I thought it would be a great upgrade to the standard 33 to use on the grand kids poles. It's noticeably heavier though. So it wasn't what I was hoping. I have bait casters that hold more and heavier line that are lighter. And besides they have substantially better drags. So both me and the grand kids have better options. It is a smooth reel and feels substantial. If spin cast is your reel of choice and you want an upgrade to the regular 33 this is definitely a different reel .
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The line comes out of the vent holes around the reel when you cast it. I used it for 3 weeks straight to try to get used to it, could not get accurate with my casts. Went back to my old 33 and returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Carty

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves It!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Reel! My husband searched all the sporting goods stores for this reel. Including Pro Bass. No one had it! Amazon did & for $20 cheaper than list price!! Even better, he says it’s the best reel he ever had or bought in 60+ years. Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen32904

customer_reviews.title: Awesome simple reel anyone can use.  feels great on the water.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an early fathers day gift for my father. He's old school so none of that baitcast or spinner junk for him. He'll take a Zebco and a cold one everytime and shake his head at us youngens with our fancy gear :). What can I say he loves the reel, I have played with it also already when he's not looking. its a good reliable no nonsense reel. perfect for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality reel so far.
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today, it is as advertised, and $43 less than what Cabelas is selling it for. It appears to be exactly like the one I’ve handled there. First thing I did was remove the factory line and replace it with Trilene XT. I also disassembled and lubricated it. The only con so far is the drag. I cannot set it as low as I’d like. Other than that, I will see how it works in 35 degree weather on Monday.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wynieski

customer_reviews.title: Will not retrieve smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I use this for small lake creek fishing. It came with the handle on the right hand side and was difficult to retrieve. So, being a left handed fisherman, I changed sides. Nope still wonky. Can't make a frog dance or do a consistent retrieve. Will not do a smooth retrieve. Feels wonky and not smooth at all. Will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor excuse for "Pro" quality
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for its action. 1 star for.cheap construction. Scale weighted for durability. Had the reel for 6 months. Plastic gears already deformed, other parts worn and bent after light use. Poor excuse for "Pro" quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not a 202.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice reel, smooth operating and trouble free. It might make you switch from your open bale reel. I bought one for my wife because she doesn't like open bale, after I bought her's I got one for myself too.
customer_reviews.author: food for thought

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Garbage product. Arrived broken and will not cast or reel in. Piece of junk. Save your money and buy something else. Givning 0 stars until replaced and proven to work as advertised. Having a fishing reel that will not perform is not an option
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great reel!
customer_reviews.text: Despite some of the Mocho men out there that say this is "for kids" or good "beginner reel" this is a great reel for all ages and skill levels. Sometimes you just like the simplicity of casting and put the lure on a dime without worrying about back lash or if you set the magnetic and mechanical break for that Luer. If you are like me and like simplicity and accuracy and a good quality reel get this one you will not be disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Martin

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH LINE DEPLOY
customer_reviews.text: You must use monofiliment line with this reel.... 10 lb test works best.... the braided lines snag inside the reel and don't deploy very well,,, open face casting reels with the bale are a pain, these push button reels are best....
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money don't buy junk
customer_reviews.text: It seem like a very good real then I've got to mount it on my ugly stick with Chaturbate in it through it 3 times handles all wobbly the retrieve is very very poor I would not recommend this product for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light reel.
customer_reviews.text: Love this reel. I use it for lightweight fishing for White trout or whiting and the occasional spec trout. It's a good reel and holds up well as long as you use it for the weight of fish for which it was designed. It will handle large fish but needs good maintenance then. Needs to be taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Blasterman

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to fishing so I am not an expert. However, I have had about three or four spincast reels and this is by far the best. I am able to cast a good 50 yards and it is smooth while reeling it in. From my limited knowledge I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Na'eem Abu Hafsa

customer_reviews.title: Hate the Rubber Boot on the Casting Button
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. In general, the reel lives up to the Zebco standards of quality. It is a nice, small, and slow reel. But the rubber boot causes a lot of problems with casting because your thumb rolls around on the soft rubber boot and locks down the line before you want it to, at times.
customer_reviews.author: SGM97B

customer_reviews.title: So far - so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this only twice, but it casted great. I'm hoping it holds up. For some reason the string knotted up inside the reel once, but it was an easy fix and the fishing continued.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: This one is a better quality and pricer reel but should be great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for Xmas gifts. If you don't fish a lot, know the difference between a casting reel or a spinning reel then buy a Zebco. This one is a better quality and pricer reel but should be great for novice fishermen. I go to Canada every summer and have lots of rods and reels, casting and spinning. After seeing this reel I would like to have one myself and my wife said that she wished I'd get her one. If you like to cast a lot and use some lighter lures messing around with a spinning reel can get boring. Just a great looking reel.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh H. Craddock

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this reel is exactly as described, works great and very easy to use. the factory installed line is a little on the light side so i plan to upgrade with a heavier pound test line.
customer_reviews.author: HKB

customer_reviews.title: Great reel.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this reel. It is light weight and has good action. If I could change anything it would be the location of the drag adjustment. It is where I rest my thumb which results in unwanted changes in drag.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money best reel for a kid. Doesn't get snarled! No really it doesn't!
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth action. This is a good reel for fishing from Shore because it doesn't get tangled if you get caught in a tree. Works fine on a boat too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O.

customer_reviews.title: reel failed after three uses
customer_reviews.text: This reel started out great, but now has bad bearings. It grinds when reeling and at times even gets stuck. The reel is not usable. I've had the reel for a little over two months but only used it a hand full of times and am unable to return it because it's past the 30 days.. Very disappointed in this Zebco product. Do not buy this reel. It will fail
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Trout Fishing and now Bass
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased the reel for trout fishing from my kayak, since I do not care for open faced spin casting reels. I knew that it would work great since I have had several Zebco reels before, that were not quite as expensive. I have now started bass fishing and use this reel for my lighter lures and finesse baits. I change out the extra spool from 4lb. fluorocarbon for trout to 10lb fluorocarbon for bass. So far the reel has done a fantastic job and I could not be any more pleased. I will purchase another one when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: LOH

customer_reviews.title: Love these reals
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase 3 of these reals love them for my wife and kids. They can cast a mile with the right set up. I even take one with me when we go kayak fishing on the river. Don’t have same control as a baitcaster but ease of use makes it a good back up.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great Spincast Reel
customer_reviews.text: The Zebco Omega ZO3PRO spincast reel is the best spincast reel I have used to date. It is very well/solidly constructed and easy to disassemble and clean. Also replacement parts are readily available. It does not handle slip bobber stops well (as in it tears them up after 10ish casts), but that is a problem with all spincast reels, and not a fault of the reel itself (just the design in general).
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Line
customer_reviews.text: The line they use when fishing gets wet the hook area comes off. Too easy to break once wet. I need to put on better fishing line.
customer_reviews.author: DRAGONBONES

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this reel
customer_reviews.text: Very nice reel. Needed something to cast really light lures and this is magical. Well made too. Great addition to my bait casters!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Haven’t had it long enough to talk about durability. It’s seems to be zebco quality! I’ve owned a number over my years and I hope this lives up.
customer_reviews.author: Mehtlh

customer_reviews.title: Nice and slick
customer_reviews.text: Nice and slick. Came with the red line and an extra spool with line on it. I have no idea what weight the line is but it cast light weight lures a good 25 to 35 feet and never once tangled the line. Good bye to my open faced reel. Wen to Bull Shoals Arkansas for a week of fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: My single favorite spin cast reel. Very smooth quick enough for most baits and strong enough for most fish
customer_reviews.author: Jeritt W. King

customer_reviews.title: Best so far
customer_reviews.text: My Son is a professional fisherman and he use to laugh at me fishing with ole Zeb, as I called my 33, until I purchased the Omega Pro. It's, so far been extremely reliable, trouble free and I'm fishing as hard as he is. Don't have to worry about birds nesting, just my next cast and an occasional tree or dock. I will purchase another for back up and would recommend it to anyone for trouble free fishing. Thanks Gary
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: great reel
customer_reviews.text: Best reel I have ever owned. It's smooth, cast and reels very smooth
customer_reviews.author: Cory Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Never fails
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on two fishing trips and it is my go to reel. My open face are nice but this one is just easy push the button and cast. It is very smooth. Next year I will try braided line and see how well it works
customer_reviews.author: Bill Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excited...new to me .but ready to give it a workout today....seems high quality...
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN F OWENS

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel!
customer_reviews.text: went fishing twice so far... Perfect castability! Great retrieve and landing power!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Busch

customer_reviews.title: Best Spincast Reel ever made.
customer_reviews.text: This reel is silky smooth. Feels like a 300.00 dollar baitcast reel. The extra spool is a big bonus. Cast well. This is by far the best spincast reel I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Zebco Omega Pro
customer_reviews.text: Reel was packaged very nicely. It came with an extra spool and handle. Durability was extremely subpar. Would not even reel in decent panfish without the gears/drag slipping. Line would some how tangle in beteen spool and cup causing headaches. Not recomended
customer_reviews.author: Lenthal A.

customer_reviews.title: top notch
customer_reviews.text: I have bought every brand spincast reel for my wife. This is the best reel by far. She now has 3 of them. Highly recomended product.
customer_reviews.author: EpD

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't go here
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed with this reel. This reel had issues in a very short time. After reeling anything larger in something in the guts get tweeked and begins catching on every turn of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Miller

customer_reviews.title: I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these because I loved the Zo3 Omega that I have. Thought this one would be at least equal and hopefully better. Boy was I wrong. The bearings seem shot right out of the box. Like they are grinding real bad. Not a smooth reel at all. Very disappointing. Even after lubricating the reel, they are not right. Guess I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Toronjo

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son-in-law. He mounted it on a Ugly Stick rod. It's a nice workable combo.
customer_reviews.author: Zelm

customer_reviews.title: Spin Cast
customer_reviews.text: The Zebco Omega Pro is an excellent spin cast reel. It has many excellent features for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday reel!
customer_reviews.text: We beat this reel up almost every day fishing all types of fish, and it does not disappoint. Zebco has stood the test of time. There's a reason they are still around!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: slow retrieve rate. Good for spy baiting and live bait or slow techniques
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Not great. Wanted an easy to cast solution to a bait caster. The gear ratio is very slow. Makes a great live bait reels. I actually gave mine to a friend specially for spy baiting due to the slow retrieve.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Engle

customer_reviews.title: Very good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and works very well. Sometimes simple is better. I can focus on fishing and not my reel.
customer_reviews.author: Witness#2018

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. It’s super nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to fish for some largemouth bass. This is a quality unit. Smooth as glass, casts a mile. Might buy one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A Luft JR

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Wish these held a little more line. My wife likes them and it seems to work fine
customer_reviews.author: J. Savoie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Fishing naturally. Good spin cast reel. I now own four.
customer_reviews.author: SDG

customer_reviews.title: Reel is dependable.
customer_reviews.text: The reel is smooth. I'm using them for customers on white bass. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice spincast reel
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice reel. It cast fairly smooth and retrieves nicely. The only complaint I have is when I went to change out the spools out it was on so tightly that it skipped gears on the inside but I did get it off now after doing that it doesn't seem quite as smooth but that could be all in my head.
customer_reviews.author: rs8451

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what you need if you dont like baitcaster
customer_reviews.text: Never bird nest . cast like pro . pullin up big 6 lb bass threw the weeds
customer_reviews.author: Josh b.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Spincast reel
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Spincast reel. Quiet, strong, accurate. I got the smaller one for my wife and she liked hers so much that I had to try one.
customer_reviews.author: Royce Michna

customer_reviews.title: Best closed face you’re going to find.
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of buying cheap ones every couple seasons. Must admit it’s quality impressed me and its cast is very smooth. It really is a professional level closed face reel.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Short lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Reel worked great for some time and I caught tons of fish on it. Casted far, reeled smoothly and fought well. After three months of weekly use, it began making a churning sound while reelin in, it won’t fight a fish, disappointing
customer_reviews.author: craig m zell

customer_reviews.title: Nice reel!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t use an open face, this lets me bass fish like a pro without the bird nest. Easily keeps a top water bait on top. Comes with two handles so you can pick your own poison.
customer_reviews.author: kim f.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth real
customer_reviews.text: This real is very smooth and quit, I love it. They must have received a lot of great feedback because they raised the price now UGH.
customer_reviews.author: tom beers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome reel!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, quiet and casts a mile! I bought 2 and plan on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: aw

customer_reviews.title: solid reel... but replace the line in a year
customer_reviews.text: pretty solid reel. Reminds me of the quality of the Zebco 33 from back in the 60's before they turned them into junk. The line is only good for one season as it breaks off in year two.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight B. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Best spincast money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I know most people say spincast reels are just for kids, but I disagree. I love this reel and I use it all the time, and works flawless. I have caught catfish, bass and crappie on it. And you do not have to practice just to keep the line from tangling ever other cast. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: matthewbrowne

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Kicking it old school with this Zebco. High quality, at a reasonable price point. Me Likey!!
customer_reviews.author: Smackafatty

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: I own more expensive spin cast reels but i have to say this is my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Eric Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and easy to use. Casting smoothness and distance is a exceeds all expectations. Drag takes a little to get to your preference but once there no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: Everything but the handle is crap
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I liked was the feel of the handle. Give me a 33 classic any day but these new reels are crap. lol sent that crap back
customer_reviews.author: doug bennett

customer_reviews.title: ... younger days always has been always will be a great all-around real
customer_reviews.text: It was smooth as silk take me back to my younger days always has been always will be a great all-around real
customer_reviews.author: Perry Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Zebco Omega reel. It is well made and works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Gedunk

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Got my first one two months ago. Bought another one last week. I have 0 complaints. They work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dribble

customer_reviews.title: Best I have owned!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of spincast deals in my life. These are hands down the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase yet
customer_reviews.text: Love this reel well worth the money. Arrived on time and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kecia

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Zebco makes a great reel... I've used it for years and caught some monsters...
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as good as it should be for the money, just buy a 33 platinum
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I just want to fish, Without CRAP from the equipment.!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these. no problems, long casting off the bank for weekend fisherman.No equipment CRAP.
customer_reviews.author: Ced

customer_reviews.title: Good reel--about the same as my old Zebco 33
customer_reviews.text: Reel works well, but not any better than one of my older Zebco 33's. I guess my expectations were higher, but still overall satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B. Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice reel but could be better. For what I am doing I wont complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Decent casting distance and nice build quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent casting distance and nice build quality. I bought it to replace a piece of crap. Very quiete. It's too expensive for a child and not adequate for an experienced fisherman. This is what I Consider a niche product.It is great as a secondary piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: E. Guttman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my girlfriend, she was having a hard time with a spinning real. We have had it out a few times now with absolutely no issues. Only thing is it has really low gears and is pretty slow for more advance fishing like using a jerk bait where you would need to pick up line quickly
customer_reviews.author: James Lokken

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Long Casting
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and long distance casting initially. I’ve only used it once so I don’t know about it’s long term performance yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Gee

customer_reviews.title: I hate bait cast reels and have been looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate bait cast reels and have been looking for a high quality spin cast for a long time. Bought one last year and love it! Best reel I've ever used in my 66 years! Highly recommend this reel and combo with the Rhino 6.6 foot rod and you have one bass catchin machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best of The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have used spincast reels since I was 6 years old. This reel is like magic. The ability for long casts and fast retrieves is awesome. This reel is a must have for anyone who uses spincast reels. Great price and fast delivery. Awesome !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill W Welliver

customer_reviews.title: bought two of these reels love them great smooth action great casting would buy
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these reels love them great smooth action great casting would buy again
customer_reviews.author: AZTrucker

customer_reviews.title: Best reel I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to the big outdoor stores. This is the best reel I have ever owned. This makes the 4th one added to my collection. Top to bottom quality, feels strong casting & retrieving.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Good reel. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great reel. Love the action. I would have rated a 5 if not for the thin rubber button cover that is already showing signs of wear through.
customer_reviews.author: Venturous

customer_reviews.title: nice reel!
customer_reviews.text: Have fished with Zebco's for years. Have two Z03's that are well built. Expect this reel to surpass them all. Feels and looks built to last. Change to double handle was easy. Look forward to using this reel for a number of backlash free years.
customer_reviews.author: JBD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and was just good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: rockettearl

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth
customer_reviews.text: Very nice spin cast reel. Very smooth. The only issue I have is that on occasion, when I cast line momentarily hits my fingers through the slots in the housing. Maybe I am holding the reel wrong. Other than that it is the best built spincast reel that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Father loved this gift and has had no complaints since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this reel
customer_reviews.text: Thumb release too difficult to depress. Very uncomfortable to depress..Way overpriced..going to return it..sid shaw..disappointed in this expensive reel
customer_reviews.author: Cancer guy

customer_reviews.title: Great reel.
customer_reviews.text: Great reel no backlashes .I loaded it with 20 pound test spider wire and could cast it to China .
customer_reviews.author: Walter kucner

customer_reviews.title: Zebco Delivers
customer_reviews.text: Great reel! Caught a 3 lb bass on first outing and handled it like a pro!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my husband and he has been very Impressed with the Zeno.
customer_reviews.author: Frances R. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Not like your old Spincasters
customer_reviews.text: Wow, not like your old Spincasters! Casting far distantes is a breeze and it’s very smooth
customer_reviews.author: Eric F.

customer_reviews.title: Good job zebco
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get better than this. I could use this for real tournaments and wouldn’t have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: jessica bobo

product_meta.title: Zebco Omega Pro Spincast Fishing Reel, 7 Bearings (6 + Clutch), Instant Anti-Reverse with a Smooth Triple-Cam, Dial-Adjustable Disk Drag, Powerful All-Metal Gears, Spare Spool
feature_bullets: POWERFUL REEL: The Omega Pro Spincast is a closed-cast fishing reel that comes pre-spooled with 10-pound Zebco fishing line. This reel features aluminum covers, an extra Dual-Paddle handle, and a soft-touch thumb button for smooth and easy casting.
SMOOTH RETRIEVAL: This reel features 7 bearings (6 + clutch), a 19-inch retrieve rate, right/left hand retrieve, and all-metal gears to stand tough for many fishing adventures to come!

RELIABLE: The Omega Pro brings an elevated fishing experience to a trusted spincast. The instant anti-reverse technology on this reel helps you secure your next prized catch, enhancing any fishing trip due to its smooth feel and reliability.

VERSATILE USE: With a mono capacity of 85/10, this reel is especially ideal for heavy species such as walleye, bass, catfish, and striper. Set a new gold standard for angling achievement with Omega Pro.
